body.name: EMODA 7 Inch Metal Queen Bed Frame for Box Spring and Mattress, 9 Legs Support Metal Base Bedframe Tool-Free and Easy Assembly, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 57 mins
features: Sturdy and Reliable: This platform base are solid steel and noise free construction, which are using center support beam and 9 legs to support your box spring and mattress more stable and provide you a good sleep time.
Non-Slip Design: On bed frames' left and right side come with 6 pieces mattress gasket pad, which will keep your box spring or mattress from slipping.
Easy to Assemble Metal Base: This queen size bed frame can be easily set up in 10 minutes with tool free, the package include all required hardware and clear instructions.
Headboard Compatible : The bed frame include with brackets, and you can use it to DIY your own standard-size headoard, and please note extra hardware for attachment is not included.
Queen Size Bed Frame Measures: 76"L x 59.6"-60.6"W x 7"H(1 inch adjustable for Width), and suit for box spring and mattress size: 79"L x 59"-60"W

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-Quality Box Springs at a Fraction of the Cost of Coil Springs
reviews.reviewText: Traditional box springs have been marketed with such features as "individually wrapped coil springs" and other nice-sounding features that cost the consumer $1,000+ depending on the size of the mattress. These box springs are constructed from high-quality steel that has been CDC machined so that the powder-coated parts fit together perfectly. Although the unit requires assembly and comes with a small wrench and hex tool (and even extra nuts and bolts in case one or two are misplaced), assembly goes much faster with a socket wrench. The box springs are shipped in a double-wall cardboard box, and the main components (a frame comprised of sturdy bars that unfold and fit together perfectly) are encased in plastic. The relatively small box (under four feet high) is quite heavy, so a buyer with back problems or the like should plan on using a handcart to move the box into a garage workspace. Once assembled the unit can be carried fairly easily because the weight is evenly distributed. When the assembled box spring is placed on the slats in the frame of the bed, about twenty powder-coated bars are placed in slots, creating a solid frame for the mattress. When the mattress is in place, assuming that the mattress itself is in good condition, the bed feels exactly the same as if it had coil springs--but at roughly one-tenth of the price of name-brand coil springs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and sturdy,took a little to assemble but it wasn’t hard and they provided all the tools
reviews.reviewText: Great product and worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I have to say my expectations were low on this, however, it was easier to assemble than I thought it would be and it has been wonderful to sleep on. I am glad that the cover leaves the bottom section open to allow for air flow. I would buy this again.**Update**This has worked out great. Our little one is autistic and loves to sit and rock back and forth with a heavy shift each time and the frame is holding up so much better than her old wooden one. We will buy this again when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars better than I expected!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, clear instructions, well marked pieces, nothing missing! Sturdy too. Pleased with the product and also the speed of delivery. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed a Lift
reviews.reviewText: Our mattress sat too low on our new bed and this frame did the trick. Very solid with no noise. Easy to assemble. Great product. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s Cheaply Made. But decent buy.
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was easy as can be. Fit my king bed perfectly! Only issue I have is the stability and quality. It’s Cheap. We didn’t even have it set up for a full month and everything in the middle bent. The material isn’t very sturdy. If you aren’t one to be in your bed often, it’s perfect, but for my partner and I, it wasn’t the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: This box spring was perfect for us - it was strong, easy to assemble, the dimensions are accurate and the price was great for what you are getting. I am so happy with my purchase. I would highly recommend this item to anyone needing it

reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble and gives great support for our heavy matters. I’m sleeping better.
